usecase.name: User Registration
usecase.scenario: Farmers, SMEs or Vendors register in Pushti
usecase.preconditions: Farmers, SMEs or vendors must be a Bangladeshi adult citizen.
steps: If the user chooses farmer, he also chooses farmer type
User selects his division, district, upazilla, union
User gives his other informations like phonen number, email, address.
User gives his preferred password and confirms it

testcases.name: Valid Course Selection
testcases.description: Verify that a student can successfully select and register for valid courses in a semester.

testcases.name: Empty Course Selection
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where a student tries to submit an empty course selection.

testcases.name: Advisor Approval
testcases.description: Verify that the advisor can successfully approve a student's registration.

testcases.name: Advisor Rejection
testcases.description: Verify that the advisor can reject a student's registration.
